An email from AT&T/Cingular just arrived in my inbox informing me of the new store locater that will enable you find the closest AT&T Store selling cocain iPhones on Friday. If you’re all rev’d up from my last post on the subject, you can search for those precious stores here.

Where Can I Get One?

With iPhone arriving June 29th at 6 p.m. in AT&T retail stores, the wait is almost over. Use our online store locator to find the closest AT&T store that sells Apple iPhone (limit one per person). We’ll show you maps, directions, and everything you need to get your hands on an iPhone as quickly as possible.

Update: someone has created a cool Google maps mashup to help you locate the iPhone.
